comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: **Dignified Code Simplifier Review**: Redundant return statement - Both line 38 and 39 return 'github'. Can be consolidated by combining conditions: `if env_value is not None and env_value in ("draft_pr", "github"):` - Eliminate redundant code rule

comments.author: schrockn
comments.body:
Fixed in commit 4cd737bfe — consolidated nested conditions into single `if env_value is not None and env_value in ("draft_pr", "github"):` with one return path for the default.

_Addressed via `/erk:pr-address` at 2026-02-21 19:44 EST_
